website_summaries.verdict: Though pricey, it's the best option if you need a powerful model that can handle a bit more than basic backyard cleanup.
pros: A rugged machine with gas-powered engine
Chips and shreds branches up to 3 inches in diameter

customer_reviews.title: Near perfection
customer_reviews.text: I'd have giving it 6 stars if it hadn't arrived with a blown inner tube ($4 to replace). Engine starts on the first pull. Needs a heat shield on the muffler. I thought I saw photos that had one but mine does not, ouch. Has a big heavy flywheel that powers thru 2 inch stuff (three inch stuff bogs it down). Chip size is good, Welds look great, built solid. Arrives on a pallet, assembly simple. XPO is the best shipper ever.
customer_reviews.author: nancy dunne,nancy dunne

customer_reviews.title: Also now that I'm using it I'm extremely happy with the machine itself
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this I couldn't get it to start, which was my fault, I called the company a real human answered the phone he did not forward me to someone else And he told me what I needed to do to start the machine, it started immediately. Unbelievable customer service! Also now that I'm using it I'm extremely happy with the machine itself.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Harris

customer_reviews.title: Works well with dry wood only!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent machine but *notice*! This machine is for seasoned branches only! Don't expect to be munching and mulching any fresh-cut branches or the machine will jam and you will have to stop it, and clear the chute and chipping chamber!!! It works well for old dry stuff that's been around for awhile...
customer_reviews.author: Wright

customer_reviews.title: failed after 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: The chute was challenging to put together as the holes did not line up correctly when bolting the chute together. I got past that but after about 10 minutes of use, chipping plum suckers the chipper stopped, i disengaged the wheel, machine fired right back up, re-engaged and machine stopped again. after two more tries the pull cord snapped.... now i'm returning. very disappointing, and i still have lots to chip. i'm going to buy local, so at least i can get service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Starts great runs great. Eats up the branches up to 4 ", just take your time. Small plate in discharge chute, removed it and worked better. Easy to clear if it does clog.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas G Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Chipped up many small trees
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in good condition being packed in a metal crate. Initially this product did not work well at all and was easily clogged after chipping a few small branches. Before returning this product we removed the orange saftey flap at the output as recomended by other users. After this we were able to chip up hundereds of small trees and grape vines that were cluttering my side yard with absolutely zero other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Awesum

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy, heavy duty chipper shredder for home use
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, heavy duty chipper shredder for home use. It handles 2" limbs handily; and probably would do 3", but I didn't try. I found that it did tend to clog the outlet chute periodically, so I have been watching it more closely, since, once that happens, it is usually hard to clear the flywheel, and get the chipper working again. Be sure to use earmuffs and safety glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Petereno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chipper for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am very satisfied with this chipper. I have chipped some branches over 3" but have to feed really slow. As seen in other reviews, with some greener wood debris you also have to go slower or it does have a tendency to clog, mainly because of the green leaves or needles. I learned to slow down when putting through a lot of green fir or cedar needles.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Easy, One Pull Start
customer_reviews.text: If you feed too fast it can clog the exit chute. Also, don’t force it as green, flexible branches can wrap around the shaft. Keep wrenches handy to open cover to clear clogs. Other than that, it works well. Got 9 wheelbarrows full in 5 hours. It has 2 oil plugs and drains. One plug is higher than the other so I used that one. Also one drain plug has a hole underneath it for easy drainage.
customer_reviews.author: T.C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Solid Unit
customer_reviews.text: First chipper I've owned so I don't have any personal experience to compare this unit with another. Assembled and had the unit running in about an hour. Starts well, easy to operate and cleared a fairly huge pile of slash and other cuttings during first use. Good purchase and good machine to reduce fuel when out of burn season.
customer_reviews.author: emcdouga

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: LIKED MOST EVERYTHING. REMOVING THE CLOGS CAN BE DIFICULT. AN ACCESS DOOR OR PANEL ON THE BOTTOM WOULD HAVE BEEN NICE. IT WILL RIP UP A 3 INCHER. THE ONE CHUTE FOR ALL INPUTS IS GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: thaddeus  arnold

customer_reviews.title: Removal of the OSHA Flap was benefitial.
customer_reviews.text: The wet leaves tend to clog the chipper blade chamber. I feel this will be a money well spent item.
customer_reviews.author: markaup33

customer_reviews.title: well built and shipped
customer_reviews.text: this machine came well packaged and easy to assemble. Started up on first pull. Happily chopped with only two plugs. Removed so-called OSHA flap no more problems. Waiting for spring to start again. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy durable chipper
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy machine , handles well , shredded materials great for flower beds
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Love this chipper!
customer_reviews.text: I cant say enough about this chipper, its easy to use and small enough to maneuver around the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Justin I.

customer_reviews.title: ... a review but you should know this thing is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I never take the time to write a review but you should know this thing is awesome!!! It's powerful for anything you throw in there , fresh cut limbs and old ones , no leaves though , packageing was great comes in crate with a steal frame , easy to put together, about 20 mins , doesn't come with oil so make sure you have Briggs and Stratton oil sae 30w and off you go , heavy duty machine that's easy to move around , absolutely love love it , I'm a customer from NY who use's this chipper on a daily bases
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge potentials when customized
customer_reviews.text: Moderated over the years with a help of a welder. Works perfectly now when added a blade instead of screen in the disposing shoot. Will provide specs and details how to customize it properly.
customer_reviews.author: JCJ

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect chipper
customer_reviews.text: Only drawback is bottom of chipper should have a door to access debris from bottom. Otherwise, no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Gray solar

customer_reviews.title: needed adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Needed to adjust wear plate, way off specs. Needed to adjust tension of V-belt, again way off specs. After adjustments Chipper/shredder preformed and is performing great! Would recommend. Lastly, tire rim cracked/broke when pulling off pallet, hope not a bad omen
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Great production but its wheels break.
customer_reviews.text: First day using it and it runs great and its powerful. But I already have a broken wheel cause the tire rim is hardened plastic. Hard to manuveur if you live in the country. Now with a broken tire this isn't the product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere cheaper on other sites
customer_reviews.text: I can get the same machine on another site for under 700
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This is a great chipper
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this somewhere else, but the website to leave a review would not work. This is a powerful chipper that starts easily. I had it plug a few times, due to small branches. That is the only issue I've had so far but still learning the best way to feed branches through it. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shredder as a homeowner, for the 3” thick branches you have to slow feed. It gets the advertise job done. On my personal experience with their customer service, I had a defective tire and after talking with the customer service representative, my tire was replaced within 2 days!! It is a nice buy that I am happy with. One more thing, mine was made in China .
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Chippin
customer_reviews.text: Received this for a Christmas gift. After some initial struggle to engage the belt (same issue as others), the machine worked great for smaller brush. Live on an acreage and have many smaller branches, twigs etc., The mulch chips will come in handy for fire starter, gardening, chickens......good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, high quality
customer_reviews.text: This well build Yardmax YW7565 is a great product. Heavy gauge materials used makes this chipper better than most by far. A very great value for the price. Mine was delivered within one week!! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary D.

customer_reviews.title: Remove safety flap in discharge chute.
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it is supposed to do. If it isn't working for you you probably don't know what you are doing.
customer_reviews.author: tony

product_meta.title: YARDMAX YW7565 Chipper Shredder, 3" Diameter, Briggs & Stratton, CR950, 6.5HP, 208cc
product_meta.description: The YARDMAX Chipper Shredder is durable, easy-to-use and conveniently turn branches and other yard debris into mulch, compost or wood chips. With an efficient self-feeding system, branches and twigs up to 3ʺ in diameter can be loaded directly in the machine without extra prep or pruning. Extremely maneuverable, these chipper shredders can be easily moved around to save valuable time when clearing a space. Not only can you clean your yard of debris, but save money and the planet repurposing the output as an attractive addition to your next landscaping project. Delivering enhanced design options as standard, you can’t go wrong with a wood shredder from YARDMAX.
feature_bullets: Durable and easy-to-use, sufficiently handles branches up to 3" in diameter - saving valuable time and hassle
Spacious, self-feeding chute designed to handle longer branches with ease
Solid, steel casings provide the durable parts necessary to handle rugged jobs, time and again
Simple maintenance through easily accessible chipper blades

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
